title: X-Men: Legacy - Salvage (Trade Paperback)
description:
Xavier’s journey comes to an end! It’s the moment readers have been waiting for: Rogue makes her return to the pages of X-Men! But while Xavier seeks out Rogue, who — or what — is searching for him? Hunter becomes hunted and friend becomes foe in a story that will change your favorite Southern Belle forever. Rogue fans: Do not miss this story! Plus: It’s the confrontation Xavier’s been dreading: a sit-down with his half-brother, the unstoppable Juggernaut! And finally, Professor X’s odyssey brings him full circle as he answers a call from the Acolytes. But what do they want? Revenge? Or a new leader? Xavier’s LEGACY journey ends here! Collecting X-MEN LEGACY #219-225.
Rated T  …$19.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-3876-1
